com.tencent.mm.opensdk.utils

类 MD5

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.mm.opensdk.utils.MD5

  • public final class MD5
extends java.lang.Object
    MD5 digest wrapper
    MD5计算封装

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMessageDigest

        public static final java.lang.String getMessageDigest(byte[] buffer)
        get md5 string for input buffer
        参数:
        buffer - data to be calculated
        返回:
        md5 result in string format

      • getRawDigest

        public static final byte[] getRawDigest(byte[] buffer)
        get md5 in byte array
        参数:
        buffer - data to be calculated
        返回:
        md5 result in byte array format

      • getMD5

        public static final java.lang.String getMD5(java.io.InputStream is,
                                            int bufLen,
                                            int offset,
                                            int length)
        Get the md5 for inputStream. This method cost less memory. It read bufLen bytes from the FileInputStream once.
        参数:
        is -
        bufLen - bytes number read from the stream once. The less bufLen is the more times getMD5() method takes. Also the less bufLen is the less memory cost.

      • getMD5ExtendBytes

        public static final java.lang.String getMD5ExtendBytes(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                       int bufLen,
                                                       int offset,
                                                       int length,
                                                       byte[] extendBytes)
        Get the md5 for inputStream. This method cost less memory. It read bufLen bytes from the FileInputStream once.
        参数:
        is -
        bufLen -
        offset -
        length -
        extendBytes - extend bytes which would be add to the end of input stream for MD5 calculating

      • getMD5

        public static final java.lang.String getMD5(java.io.InputStream is,
                                            int bufLen)
        Get the md5 for inputStream. This method cost less memory. It read bufLen bytes from the FileInputStream once.
        参数:
        is -
        bufLen - bytes number read from the stream once. The less bufLen is the more times getMD5() method takes. Also the less bufLen is the less memory cost.

      • getMD5

        public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.lang.String file)
        Get the md5 for the file, using less memory.

      • getMD5

        public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.io.File file)
        Get the md5 for the file, using less memory.

      • getMD5

        public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.io.File file,
                                      int bufLen)
        Get the md5 for the file. call getMD5(FileInputStream is, int bufLen) inside.
        参数:
        file -
        bufLen - bytes number read from the stream once. The less bufLen is the more times getMD5() method takes. Also the less bufLen cost less memory.

      • getMD5

        public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.lang.String file,
                                      int offset,
                                      int length)
        Get the md5 for the file, using less memory.

        public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.io.File file,
                                      int offset,
                                      int length)
        Get the md5 for the file, using less memory.
